item.title: Report X-2024070125
item.description:
Report X-2024070125

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-21
  • City: Irondale
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During switching operations, a yard crew observed liquids spilling from the manway area on tank car GATX 89702. The car was set out and isolated. A response contractor inspected the car and found 3 manway bolts were less than tool tight. The manway was opened and the gasket was found in good condition. The manway was properly secured in a tool tight condition.
